name: Haus Barbara
description: Our house is situated away from the town centre, above Burgstall, on a hill.
The price includes local taxes and a final cleaning charge.
Use the B169 to Mayrhofen - turn right after the roundabout, over a level crossing, and along the Schwendaustrasse to Burgstall, house nr. 355a.

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower, toilet, 3 bed rooms
makesOffer.description: Apartment for 4-6 persons with 3 separate double bedrooms with 2 x shower/WC, TV, lounge/kitchen, dining area with table and chairs, private south-west facing balcony enjoying wonderful views, situated on the top floor, deck chairs in the garden, sun bathing area, garage.

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower, toilet, 2 bed rooms
makesOffer.description: Ground floor apartment suitable for 4 persons. 2 separate double bedrooms with shower/WC, spacious lounge/kitchen with TV, large terrace at the front where fabulous mountain views can be enjoyed, garden, sun bathing area, garden furniture and deck chairs, garage.
